head.title: Danbury ISD COVID-19 Response – COVID-19 – Danbury Independent School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Danbury Independent School District is located in Danbury, TX.

aside.span: Dedication to Excellence and Achievement For All

li.a: DES CATT Community and Teachers Together

img.alt: Photo by Jeffrey Hamilton on Unsplash
Photo by moren hsu on Unsplash

div.aside: Updates from emailed announcements are shared on the News & Announcements section of the Danbury ISD homepage. Click HERE to see those COVID-19 Announcement Updates

span.style: font-family: franklin-gothic-urw, sans-serif

div.span: Danbury ISD is moving to remote instruction for all students through May 4, 2020. A majority of districts in Brazoria County and the greater Houston area are following a similar cancellation based on a recommendation from county health officials.

span.style: font-family: franklin-gothic-urw, sans-serif

div.span: It is important to note that in-person instruction will not be offered, but the District’s staff members are working hard on a plan for remote instruction for students. We will share information about the Distance Learning Plan very soon but every student's parent/guardian should get a call/email/update from a staff member to discuss the next few weeks. Watch for a Family Resources page also designed to familiarize parents and students with platforms that will assist students as needed and continue to partner with teachers to support distance learning. Teachers will start sharing opportunities for students to practice and reinforce academic content and skills using familiar tools currently used in their classrooms.

span.style: font-family: franklin-gothic-urw, sans-serif

div.span: We encourage everyone to review additional resources, important links, and additional websites from this page.

p.strong: Internet Access - View Details about internet offers from area providers
Apps for Video calling - stay connected with friends and family using video calling services

p.strong: Danbury ISD is also monitoring COVID-19 from the links below. Families can see the current news, updates, and helpful resources upon which our decisions are based.

div.a: All UIL Activities Suspended Due to COVID-19... Open to Read more
Governor Abbott Waives STAAR Testing Requirements
See CDC traveler's health notices for up-to-date guidance and recommendations relating to travel
Meal Service Plan & Information about the Houston Food Bank from our Announcements

span.style: font-family: Raleway, sans-serif

div.span: District Administration office hours, while schools are closed, are from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. You may call (979) 922-1218 if you have questions, and we ask that you please call or e-mail to make an appointment before coming to the Administration Building.

span.style: font-family: Raleway, sans-serif

div.span: Staff Contact Pages - District Administration, Danbury High School, Danbury Middle School, and Danbury Elementary School
